content:
Should Mathlib.lean contain the line import Mathlib.Tactic?

This happens now, but seems superfluous.

Alternatively, should the Tactic imports of Mathlib.lean be compacted to just import Mathlib.Tactic?
No, just keep it simple and put every lean file into Mathlib.lean

Ok, so "every .lean file" means "every .lean file after Mathlib/Tactic.lean was created", right? This actually is an extra twist in the script that generates the "import all" files, given its current structure.
It exists in the source repository before and after updating it, yes?
Yes, but the script that creates those files from scratch should make sure to create Mathlib/Tactic.lean before creating Mathlib.lean.
